players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Consider your actions carefully. I know who you are, and I can eliminate you if needed."
You: "I know Diana is the mafioso. I will work with Bob to eliminate her."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
